text: Year 24 BC was either a common year starting on Thursday, Friday or Saturday or a leap year starting on Friday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Augustus and Flaccus. ==Events== * Caesar Augustus becomes Roman Consul for the tenth time. His partner is Gaius Norbanus Flaccus. * Augustus founds the city of Nicopolis in Egypt
title: 24 BC
